document.title: SP418-L-Healthy Children: 10 Months Old

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract:
Nowadays, you may feel bombarded with advice from many sources. Since the “experts” are sometimes not in agreement, you may be confused when one person tells you one thing and someone else tells you another.

If you have been overloaded with advice, then stop for a minute and back up. Summon your own resources. Do what you think is best, and rely on your own judgment.
